message.name: ERR_CASEEVIDENCEGROUPLINK_XFV_STATUSCODE_INVALID
message.locale: Evidence links can only be created on evidence trees in a state of 'In Edit'.

message.name: ERR_CASEEVIDENCEGROUPLINK_REMOVE_XFV_STATUSCODE_INVALID
message.locale: Evidence links can only be removed on evidence trees in a state of 'In Edit'.

message.name: ERR_CASEEVIDENCEGROUPLINK_FV_EVIDENCE_TYPE_CODE_EMPTY
message.locale: The evidence type code must be specified.
